item.title: Hello World
item.description: This marks the beginning of my blog. After months of procrastination I have finally managed to migrate my website from Jekyll to Hugo. Through this blog I will be sharing my knowledge about things that I have learned with the intention of contributing back to the python, datascience, and machine learning community.
